text: تالله ان كنا لفى ضلل مبين

translations.translation: By God, we were plainly in error
By Allah, we were surely in clear error
they will say, "By God, we were in clear error
“By oath of Allah, we were indeed in open error.”
By Allah, we were truly in a manifest error,
By Allah! we were certainly in manifest error,
By God, we were certainly in manifest error
By Allah, of a truth we were in error manifest
By Allah, we have indeed been in an error manifest.
‘By Allah, we had indeed been in manifest error
By Allah, we were truly in an error manifest,
By Allah, we were truly in a manifest error,
By Allah, we were certainly in clear error,
“By God, We were in evident error.
By Allah, we were indeed in manifest error
[26:97]   ‘By God, we had indeed (in, softened in place of the hardened form, with its subject omitted, in other words [it would usually be] innahu) been in manifest error,
(By Allah, of a truth we were in error manifest) in the life of the world,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: حيث قال العابدون لمعبوداتهم مقسمين مغلظين تحسراً وتحزناً: { تَٱللَّهِ إِن } أي: إنه { كُنَّا } باتخاذكم آلهة من دون الله عبدناكم كعبادته { لَفِي ضَلاَلٍ مُّبِينٍ } [الشعراء: 97] ظاهر لا يشبته على ذي مسكة ضلالته
